roleset.name: (cause to) form a coherent whole

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Unfortunately, Mr. Bork failed to distinguish between such pressures and the emergence of great issues critical to a society that must be settled judicially if it-4 is [*-4] to cohere.

example.name: predicted but downright weird
example.text: John cohered the chapters of his dissertation.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'cohere' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Compatibility.
